wiki.content:
this song is about getting out before getting down

track.name: Spike Driver Blues
comments: Love John Henry songs. This rendition is absolute perfection.
Nothing like a little MJH in the morning to start the day.
The Best 'Piedmont' BLUES pickin' man :)   check out my flickr (Shein Die) for pics of his haunts and more

@drewthedrifter - You don't consider John Hurt a "pure" bluesman?  Sure, he was great at bringing together the Piedmont / Ragtime sound with Delta blues, but he definitely wasn't a "folk" or "old-timey" musician.
This song is actually an adaption of a field/chain gang song that was sung in prisons. I’m getting into some of these early recordings. It’s awesome to hear the evolution of the blues.
These oldies are kinda scary when your playing them all alone in your house with all the lights off in your basement..xD
The guitar on this song is Keb Moish to me ....... I like it
